summary: Isabelle (Valerie Lemercier), HR of a large cruise company, made the mistake of choosing her boss as a lover. Before embarking on the maiden voyage of the new flagship of the fleet, though,... See full summary »
cast: Franck Dubosc|Valérie Lemercier|Gérard Darmon|Luisa Ranieri|Lionnel Astier|Elisa Servier|Philippe Lellouche|Jean-Michel Lahmi|Guilaine Londez|Shirley Bousquet|Elisabeth Margoni|Reem Kherici|François Vincentelli|Enrico Macias|Petra Silander|Vincent Roget|Christian Gabriel|Héctor Cabello Reyes|Gil Alma|Noah Morillon-Schieber-Herrbach|Caroline Tillette|Tangi Colombel|Sabine Crossen|Anne-Sophie Louvet|Ian McCamy|July Morel|Amanda Scott|Fawad Siddiqui|Viola Bandini|Oudesh Rughooputh
title: Bienvenue à bord
